department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Office furniture for a Canadian government department.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: EN439-241231
## Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of workspace furniture under the General Stream for categories 3 and 6.

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4308397936
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4308397936
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-14
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-07T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-23
- **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

## Tender Purpose
The PSPC aims to acquire office furniture for delivery and installation between April 19th, 2024, and November 30, 2024, at Gatineau, Quebec. The procurement will meet the specific requirements of the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

## Tender Scope
The tender covers the General Stream for categories 3 and 6. The acquisition will include:

*   Accommodation furniture (56100000)
*   Office furniture (56101700)

## Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be awarded based on the **lowest price** received from qualified bidders.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers who meet the eligibility requirements under the following agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## How to Bid
For more information and to access the tender, please visit the public procurement platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18006741?extsite=MTgwMDY3NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://)
